attributes.action: recognise Essential Tremors as a disability
attributes.additional_details: Essential Tremors is now recognised as a progressive disorder by the medical proffesion, it is a debilitating condition which can render the sufferer incapable of conducting everyday normal functions, thus rendering the sufferer to rely upon others to assist them, yet the D.W.P do not recognise it as a disability. This petition for for the Legal Recognition of Disability.
